title: "Self-Hypnosis Techniques for Better Sleep and Relaxation"
first_phrase: In the previous section of the text, the author explains the physical process of self-hypnosis, focusing on the use of eye movements and visualization techniques. In the last 200 words, the author gives some final considerations and notes on how to practice self-suggestion in a wakeful state. The technique involves focusing on the mathematical symbol for infinity and tracing its continuous loop with your mind's eye. The author also suggests an alternative method for those who cannot fall asleep, which involves pressing the center of your forehead, covering your ears, and visualizing a luminous sphere behind your head. Overall, the author highlights the importance of training and understanding the seriousness of self-suggestion practices to achieve positive results.
content: Aiutati dalla sensazione al centro della fronte realizzate una convergenza oculare, mentre ascoltate alternativamente il rumore del sangue che passa attraverso le orecchie prima a dx e poi a sn. Infine realizzate una sfera luminosa (sempre mantenendo la convergenza oculare) dietro la vostra nuca, ed immaginate come se voi foste in tale sfera luminosa e vi guardaste da fuori. Avrete una sensazione di calma e distacco da voi stessi, essendo acceduti al livello più fino del fluido. A questo punto potete tornare in voi ed aprire gli occhi.
